com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.api.command

Class CommandFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.api.command.CommandFormat

  • public class CommandFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains formatting options for the auto generated help command inside of AbstractCommand

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        headerLeft - left side of the header
        headerRight - right side of the header
        title - title of the header
        commandPrefix - prefix before each command
        separator - separates the command and the description
        descriptionPrefix - prefix before each description
        footer - footer
